jobTitle: Procurement Order Management Specialist (Buyer/Supply chain) - Remote | WFH
description:
About The Role

We are seeking a dedicated Procurement Specialist to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will collaborate with various internal stakeholders to manage end-to-end procurement activities for our operations, ensuring the timely delivery of products and services. Your expertise will be vital in driving value creation and maximizing business outcomes.

Responsibilities

  • **Stakeholder Collaboration:** Work closely with internal teams such as Engineering, Construction, Facilities, and Manufacturing to gather comprehensive procurement requirements and translate them into purchase orders.
  • **Supplier Management:** Lead the end-to-end RFx process, partnering with stakeholders to identify top suppliers, foster competition within the supply market, and maximize value creation.
  • **Purchase Order Management:** Create and manage purchase orders using our ERP system, communicating effectively with approvers to describe and justify purchases.
  • **Negotiation:** Negotiate pricing, lead times, terms, and conditions to achieve the best outcomes for the business.
  • **Invoice Management:** Oversee purchase order management and invoice issue disposition to ensure on-time delivery of products or services and prompt payment of invoices.
  • **Problem Solving:** Resolve supply chain-related issues that may arise throughout the procure-to-pay process.

Qualifications

  • **Experience:** At least 2 years in a Procurement, Buyer, Order Management, or Supply Chain role within manufacturing, supply chain, or engineering.
  • **ERP Systems:** Proficiency with ERP systems such as Oracle, SAP, or similar.
  • **Purchase Order Management:** Experience handling a high volume of purchase orders daily, coordinating with Accounts Payable to ensure timely invoice payments.
  • **Stakeholder Engagement:** Proven ability to collaborate with internal stakeholders, gather procurement requirements, and translate them into purchase orders.
  • **Negotiation Skills:** Demonstrated success in negotiating pricing, lead times, contract terms, etc.
  • **Adaptability:** Experience working in a fast-paced environment.
  • **Technical Skills:** Basic knowledge of Excel and the ability to create simple spreadsheets.
  • **Customer Service:** Excellent customer service skills and a commitment to providing great support.
  • **Industry Knowledge:** Previous experience in aerospace or frontier technology industries is a plus.

How To Apply

If you are a proactive, detail-oriented professional eager to make a significant impact in a dynamic industry, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume for consideration.

We appreciate your interest and look forward to the possibility of welcoming you to our team!

*Please note: The company name has been removed to maintain confidentiality.*

Apply Now

*We are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applicants from all backgrounds. *

Employment Type: Full-Time
